spec_data.Name: ftgl
spec_data.Description:
FTGL is a free open source library to enable developers to use arbitrary
fonts in their OpenGL (www.opengl.org)  applications.
Unlike other OpenGL font libraries FTGL uses standard font file formats
so doesn't need a preprocessing step to convert the high quality font data
into a lesser quality, proprietary format.
FTGL uses the Freetype (www.freetype.org) font library to open and 'decode'
the fonts. It then takes that output and stores it in a format most
efficient for OpenGL rendering.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 01:33:17 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
